text:
Our aim is to digitalize
as much as possible.

We further transform our
digitalization capability

to be able to serve 20
more million customers,
and at the same time, aspire

to be the top three
bank in Vietnam as well

we use AWS Elastic
Disaster Recovery for 78

of our critical workloads.
The application systems
that run the banks as well,

these will be the next 500
that we will be bringing up
With DRS, it helps us to spring
it up at a moment's notice,
and the cost saving is about 48%
that we have achieved so far.

I can't imagine going back
without the AWS services.
